member.name: M:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DatalayerSystem.
member.param: Path for interprocess communication. Leave empty for automatic detection.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Datalayer#Internal#INative#NativePtr
member.summary: Gets the pointer to the underlying native API object.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Clients
member.summary: Gets the list of created clients.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Providers
member.summary: Gets the list of created providers.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance is already disposed and useless.

member.name: M:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: False if called by Finalizer, else true.

member.name: M:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Finalize
member.summary: override finalizer only if 'Dispose(bool disposing)' has code to free unmanaged resources

member.name: M:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the underlying native API object.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.ProtocolSchemeTcp
member.summary: Gets the protocol scheme for TCP communication. Recommended to connect to a DatalayerSystem not running on localhost.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.ProtocolSchemeIpc
member.summary: Gets the protocol scheme for IPC communication. Recommended to connect to a DatalayerSystem running on localhost.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.IpcPath
member.summary: Gets the path for interprocess communication.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.IsStarted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the DatalayerSystem is started.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.BfbsPath
member.summary: Sets the binary Flatbuffer path, which contains *.bfbs files.

member.name: M:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Start(System.Boolean)
member.param: Use true to start a broker. If you are a user of the ctrlX Data Layer, set to false.

example.code: using var system = new DatalayerSystem(); system.Start(startBroker: false);

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Factory
member.summary: Gets the Factory to create Clients and Providers.

member.name: P:Datalayer.DatalayerSystem.Converter
member.summary: Gets the Converter for Variant to JSON conversions.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_TIMEOUT_SETTING.Idle
member.summary: Timeout to check whether the broker is still active when client is idle. Default: 30000 ms

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_TIMEOUT_SETTING.Ping
member.summary: Timeout to wait for a response of a request. If timeout is exceeded, the request will be aborted with DL_TIMEOUT. Default: 3000 ms

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_TIMEOUT_SETTING.Reconnect
member.summary: Timeout a reconnect attempt will be done if client looses connection to broker. Default: 1000 ms

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_INVALID_ADDRESS
member.summary: Address not found, address invalid (browse of this node not possible, write -> address not valid)

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_OUT_OF_MEMORY
member.summary: Out of memory or resources (RAM, sockets, handles, disk space ...).

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_LIMIT_MIN
member.summary: The minimum of a limitation is exceeded.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_LIMIT_MAX
member.summary: The maximum of a limitation is exceeded.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_TYPE_MISMATCH
member.summary: Wrong flatbuffer type, wrong data type

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_SIZE_MISMATCH
member.summary: Size mismatch, present size doesn't match requested size.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_INVALID_HANDLE
member.summary: Invalid handle argument or NULL pointer argument.

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_INVALID_OPERATION_MODE
member.summary: Not accessible due to invalid operation mode (write not possible)

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_INVALID_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Mismatch of this value with other configured values

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_RESULT.DL_PERMISSION_DENIED
member.summary: Request declined due to missing permission rights

member.name: F:Datalayer.DLR_VARIANT_TYPE.DLR_VARIANT_TYPE_FLATBUFFERS
member.summary: Bytes as a complex data type encoded as a flatbuffer

member.summary: Gets the type of the read.
member.value: The type when reading a value (absolute node address). Input/Output type are the same.

member.summary: Gets the type of the read in.
member.value: The input type when reading a value.

member.name: P:Datalayer.ReferenceType.ReadOutType
member.summary: Gets the type of the read out.
member.value: The output type when reading a value.

member.name: P:Datalayer.ReferenceType.WriteType
member.summary: Gets the type of the write.
member.value: The type when writing a value (absolute node address). Input/Output type are the same.

member.summary: Gets the type of the write in.
member.value: The input type when writing a value.

member.name: P:Datalayer.ReferenceType.WriteOutType
member.summary: Gets the type of the write out.
member.value: The output type when writing a value.

member.name: P:Datalayer.ReferenceType.CreateType
member.summary: Gets the type of the create.
member.value: The type when creating a value (absolute node address).

member.name: P:Datalayer.ReferenceType.HasSave
member.value: Reference to a save node address which needs to be called after node change to persist the new value.

member.name: M:Datalayer.Variant.#ctor(System.Void*)
member.summary:
IMPORTANT
If this constructor is called - The Variant is created by ANSI-C API, which is also responsible for deletion, so we have to skip it here to prevent access violations. - We MUST Clone the value because this instance will be released by the ANSI-C Layer immediately.
IMPORTANT
